The expert: s verdict mentions that the claim made by Rep. Marcia Fudge was based on a figure provided by the Brennan Center for Justice, which operates within the New York University School of Law. The figure, cited widely, comes from a 2006 survey conducted by an independent polling firm and indicates that approximately 11% of all people eligible to vote do not possess a government-issued ID.
